ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rejoice all ye Hybrids
ygData.msgSnippet: heh sorry, too used to the concert hall where the first thing people do is whine and complain before they actually take the time to read and understand what s
ygData.messageBody:
heh sorry, too used to the concert hall where the first thing people do is whine
and complain before they actually take the time to read and understand what's
been really said.

At 12:52 PM 1/15/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Whoa...easy there. Heh...the guy just caught something out of context, or
>misread it, and thought the worst for a moment. It's great you wanna help
>set him straight, but lets not turn this into the everquest.com message
>boards.
>
>It's ok to cut people a little slack. :)
>
>At
